classifications.author: VotingRightsStudent

classifications.author: VotingIntegritySeeker2024

While the author expresses some nuance and uncertainty, and acknowledges the potential downsides of such a policy, the initial suggestion and framing of the issue is more characteristic of right-leaning perspectives on voting rights and election integrity.
